products.name: Hawaiin Kona Coffee
products.description: Well-balanced with a medium body, it is clean in the cup with a bright and cheerful acidity. Kona coffee often reveals buttery as well as spicy qualities and subtle winey tones with an excellent aromatic finish.

products.name: Mocha Java Coffee
products.description: Perhaps the most famous blend of coffee beans, Mocha Java includes Arabian (Yemen) Mocha coffee and Indonesian Java Arabica coffee, two coffees with complementary characteristics. The best Yemen Mocha coffees exhibit a lively intensity and pleasant wildness which complements the clean and bright smoothness of the Java coffee.

products.name: Kenya AA Coffee
products.description: The best Kenya AA coffees exhibit a full body and strong, rich taste with a pleasant acidity that some say provides the world's brightest coffee. The aroma of Kenya AA is fragrant with floral tones while the finish is winey with berry and citrus overtones.

products.name: Tanzania Peaberry Coffee
products.description: A medium roast provides an aroma that is floral and complex, often exhibiting hints of pineapple, citrus, or coconut. The flavor is delicate, sometimes revealing winey notes and a velvety feeling on the palate.Some long amount of text (maybe lorem ipsum for now)

products.name: Nicaraguan Coffee
products.description: Darker roasts bring compliment the chocolate and fruity flavors.

products.name: Sumatra Mandheling Beans
products.description: The caramelizing that happens in a dark roast helps to mediate the earthy, herby flavor.

products.name: Sulawesi Toraja Coffee
products.description: This multi-dimensional coffee is grown in the southeastern highlands of Sulawesi. Known best for its full body and rich, expansive flavor, Sulawesi Toraja coffee beans are very well balanced and exhibits tasting notes of dark chocolate and ripe fruit.

products.name: Ethiopian Harrar Coffee
products.description: Edgy and bold, Ethiopian Harrar displays a complexity of spice tones including cardamom, cinnamon, apricots, blueberry jam, and compote. Some Harrars exhibit tones of very rich, dark chocolate.

products.name: Ethiopian Yirgacheffe Coffee
products.description: If you prefer your coffee heavy and sweet then choose a medium-dark roast or dark roast, though a medium roast allows the coffee beans' delicate qualities to shine and enhance the bright acidity.

products.name: Guatemala Antigua Coffee
products.description: Guatemalan coffees are naturally smooth and delicious, and works well with a dark roast that creates a pleasing smoky taste in the brewed cup of coffee.
